help-file.title: EMOTE
help-file.content:
Syntax: emote <message_text> : <message_text>
The "emote" command allows you to creatively pretend that your character is doing something that the available socials do not currently allow. For example, if Fizzwig wished everyone to think he is a really nice guy, he might type:
emote hands you 10000 pcoins. -or- : hands you 10000 pcoins.
This would be viewed as everyone in the room as:
Fizzwig hands you 10000 pcoins.
Of course, Fizzwig has not really given anyone the coins, he just wants everyone to think he has.
A quicker, equivalent command is ":"
Note: "emote" is a social action that is used for *fun*. Please do not take these actions seriously.
